articles.description: Joe Gomez was injured while on international duty with England in what is a major blow to Liverpool but FIFA will pay the defender's wages in his absence
articles.content:
FIFA will subsidise Joe Gomez's £80,000-a-week wages after he was injured while on international duty.
 The Liverpool defender suffered the blow during training having joined up with the Three Lions… [+2449 chars]

articles.title: 7 Most Cursed Clubs in World Football - HITC Sevens
